author: paras25619@gmail.com
name: media-trend-analysis-agent
description: An AI agent that tracks and analyzes emerging media trends, topics, and sentiment across digital platforms in real time using Exa and Firecrawl.

environment_variables.description: OpenAI API key for LLM calls
OpenRouter API key for LLM calls
Exa API key for media search and trend analysis (required)
Firecrawl API key for content scraping when search results are insufficient (required)
